en-us: Let us know how we did at [covidbot-feedback@microsoft.com](mailto:covidbot-feedback@microsoft.com)
How can I help you?
Welcome to the Microsoft COVID-19 Bot. You can provide feedback by emailing [covidbot-feedback@microsoft.com](mailto:covidbot-feedback@microsoft.com)
["Am I eligible to receive the COVID-19 vaccine?", "Is the COVID-19 vaccine safe?", "How vaccinated is my community?"]
I'm not sure how to help you with that. Please try one of the prepared questions.
I'll need to determine your location to look up your local plan. Where do you live?
Oops. Something went wrong.
Let me see if I can find more details on the question: $QUESTION

Schedule a Vaccination
View vaccinating locations
You can find more details [here]($LINK).
